title: MNNIT Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 02 Project Fellow Posts
description: The Motilal Nehru National Institute of Technology (MNNIT) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 02 Project Fellow Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their M.E./M. Tech can apply for the MNNIT Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, appl...
